properties.title: Bivacco Farello
properties.abstract: L'ancien Biv. Farello à l'ouest du Chaltwasserpass n'existe plus. 2018 nouveau bâtiment du même nom au sud du Ritterpass.
properties.description:
New and simple bivouac above Alpe Veglia at "Le Caldaie" at the foot of the Helsenhorn. 
 The former "Bivacco Benjamino Farello" of the same name was on the Italian side of the Chaltwasserpass; it does not exist any more.
